title: Shinohara Chie Kessakushuu
description:
A collection of short stories by the author.

These are the tankoubon version, there are also the bunkobans, called: 
Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru 
(bunkoban of vol. 1 and 2)
Kootta Natsu no Hi 
(bunkoban of vol. 3 and 4)

[VOL.1] Houmonsha wa Mayonaka ni... (1984)

Story 1「訪問者は真夜中に...」 - Houmonsha wa Mayonaka ni... (A Midnight Visitor) - Masami finished summer camp and returned home. However, her mother and brother are nowhere to be seen. Only a mysterious shadow follows Masami...?!
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 1.
Story 2「そして5回の鈴が鳴る」 - Soshite 5-kai no suzu ga naru (The Bell Rings 5 Times - When the Bell Rings) 
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 2.
Story 3「優しい殺人者」 - Yasashii satsujin-sha (Kind Killer).
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 1.

[VOL.2] Mokugekisha ni Sayounara (1986)

Story 1「目撃者にさようなら」 - Mokugekisha ni sayounara
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 1.
Story 2「冬の花は鎮魂歌」 - Fuyu no hana wa chinkonka 
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 2.
Story 3「クリスタル・ドール」 - Crystal Doll
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 2.
Story 4「眠る街」 -  Nemuru machi
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 1.
Story 5「紅い伝説」 - Akai densetsu
It was also published in Soshite Gokai no Suzu ga naru and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 2.

[VOL.3] Nanika ga Yami de Miete Iru (1986)

Story 1「午前0時の逃亡者」 - Gozen 0-ji no Toubousha
It was also published in Kootta Natsu no Hi.
Story 2「なにかが闇で見ている」 - Nani ka ga Yami de Miteiru
It was also published in Kootta Natsu no Hi.
Story 3「自殺室ルームナンバー404」 - Jisatsu Shitsu Room Number 404
It was also published in Kootta Natsu no Hi and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 2.
Story 4「ウィークエンドの招待状」 - Weekend no Joutaijou 
It was also published in Kootta Natsu no Hi and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 2.

[VOL.4] 3 Hitome ga Kieta (1992)

Story 1「3人目が消えた」 - 3 Hitome ga Kieta 
It was also published in Kootta Natsu no Hi.
Story 2「凍った夏の日」 - Kootta Natsu no Hi
It was also published in Kootta Natsu no Hi and Shinohara Chie the Best Selection 1. 
Story 3「殺意には蒼いリボンをかけて」 - Satsui ni wa Aoi Ribon o Kakete
It was also published in Kootta Natsu no Hi.

matches.title: A Swallow Falling Into the Sea
Kimi ga Kimi de Aru Tameni
